title: Wings to Italy
creator_credit: Harry L. Coleman, Coleman Productions and Ideal Pictures (US)
brief_description: Points of interest ot the tourist in Italy are seen as a young couple reminisce about their vacation trip. Includes Rome, Vesuvius, Pompeii, Capri, Pisa, Siena, Florence, the Dolomites and Venice.
